learned_patterns.pattern: PRD-STRUCTURE: Use invoiceforge addendum as the most complete template for product addendums

task_history.summary: Created comprehensive PRD with 7 MVP features, user personas, and detailed acceptance criteria. Created product addendum with business logic, validation rules, and special considerations for floating point precision and accessibility.
Created comprehensive PRD and Product Addendum for basic calculator web app
Created comprehensive PRD and product addendum for Pulse with 4 personas, 6 MVP features, 24 web routes, 35 API endpoints, user flows, risk analysis
